title: Acomb Babies
deck: A group for parents and carers of non-mobile babies
article:
We are excited to announce the relaunch of Acomb Babies. Open to non-mobile babies and their parents/carers, Acomb Babies is an opportunity to meet and connect with other new parents. 

Acomb Babies will be running on Monday mornings from 9.30-11am at the Gateway Centre in a covid-safe way. Sign up for our first 3 week block (May 10th, 17th and 24th) at <https://gateway.churchsuite.co.uk/events/bgomz1fg>
